metadata.title: CVE-2020-35517 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in qemu. A host privilege escalation issue was found in the virtio-fs shared file system daemon where a privileged guest user is able to create a device special file in the shared directory and use it to r/w access host devices.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.2+dfsg-6ubuntu2').
